keyMoments.title: Blackbeard Demonstrates Earthquake Power
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard actively uses the Gura Gura no Mi power for the first time, threatening to sink Marineford to its core with tremor shockwaves.
keyMoments.significance: First demonstration of Blackbeard using Whitebeard's stolen power, showing his rise as a devastating threat.

keyMoments.title: Gura Gura Power Clashes with Sengoku
keyMoments.description: Blackbeard's tremor shockwaves clash with Sengoku's Buddha form shockwaves.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the immense power of the Gura Gura no Mi in combat against top-tier opponents.

abilities.description: Blackbeard creates powerful tremor shockwaves that can sink islands and destroy structures.

keyMoments.title: Akainu's Magma Punch Wounds Luffy
keyMoments.description: Akainu punches through Jinbe's chest with his magma fist, severely burning Luffy and creating his permanent X-shaped chest scar.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most devastating attacks in the series, leaving Luffy with a permanent reminder of the Marineford War.

keyMoments.title: Crocodile Saves Luffy with Sand Techniques
keyMoments.description: Crocodile uses Desert Grande Espada to attack Akainu and Sables to launch Luffy and Jinbe to safety.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Crocodile's sand abilities being used to protect his former enemy Luffy.

abilities.description: Crocodile creates a large blade of sand that can slice through opponents.
Crocodile creates a powerful sandstorm that can launch objects or people into the air.

name.japanese: ヒトヒトの実 モデル：大仏
name.romanized: Hito Hito no Mi, Moderu: Daibutsu

keyMoments.title: Sengoku's Buddha Shockwave vs Blackbeard
keyMoments.description: Sengoku transforms into Buddha form and delivers powerful golden shockwaves to the Blackbeard Pirates, clashing with the Gura Gura no Mi tremor shockwaves.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the immense power of Sengoku's Mythical Zoan fruit against Blackbeard's stolen power.
